column5: When fishing for Pannies I use maggots, waxworms and pieces of minnows. When fishing for Pike I use minnows and usually deadstick a large one. When fishing for Walleye I use jigs and Berkely Grubs tipped with a minnow or piece of. When fishing for trout I use a spoon and pc of minnow.  When fishing for ideas I use OFC.
Maggots on a teardrop - perch, herring, crappie, gillies Williams Half and Half - Lakers/whities Badd Boyz - Whities Big dead minnow - pike Jigging Rap - walleye
I'm not one for ice myself...  ..but when my wife is baiting for ice she usually uses Crown Royal or Baileys!  Sorry..couldn't resist!
Irishfield, i thought you quit that
sweedish pimple tipped with a minnow.
